page.title: 06MILE OAK FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The Mile Oak Football Club has been standing for 27 years. It is situated south of the Mile Oak public house. We discovered that the club was originally 3 times smaller than it is today. Success has meant larger crowds. The extension was built in 1983, so the club today is only 3 years old. The original building was built in 1958. The Football Club is well known around Tamworth, and earlier this year the club was promoted to a higher division. The club has been going since the nineteenth century. North of the club is mainly country side, but south of it is nearly all buildings. The club is surrounded by large houses owned by wealthy people.
